definition: Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
the Xia or Hsia dynasty c. 2000 BC/Xia of the Sixteen Kingdoms (407-432)/surname Xia

sentences.english: The dragon is a totem of the Chinese nation.
Huangdi was later regarded in Chinese mythology as the forefather of the Chinese nation.
sentences.chinese: 在后来的中国神话中，黄帝被尊为华夏之祖。

sentences.english: China and the Han Chinese in ancient times known.
sentences.chinese: 华夏是中国和汉族的古称。

sentences.english: They love National Geographic Magazine unfeignedly and regard it as museum piece.
sentences.chinese: 他们由衷地喜爱《华夏地理》杂志，视为珍藏。

sentences.english: The Precambrian metamorphic rocks in Northern Fujian are the important part consisting of the Cathaysian palaeocontinental basement.
sentences.chinese: 闻北前寒武纪变质岩是华夏古陆基底的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: Cathay by Ezra Pound is an epoch-making masterpiece in the history of modern poetry in the west.
sentences.chinese: 庞德的《华夏集》是西方现代诗歌史上划时代的作品。

sentences.english: Willow tree garden, are everywhere, township of the Chinese opera, glory.
sentences.chinese: 烟柳园下，笙歌处处，傩戏之乡，荣耀华夏。

sentences.english: The spring breeze blew the green Eastern divine land, the spring rain has moistened the China native place.
sentences.chinese: 春风啊吹绿了东方神州，春雨啊滋润了华夏故园。

sentences.english: Now as the hometown of Kong Fansen, Liaocheng is known to Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 现在聊城作为孔繁森的故乡已为华夏儿女所熟知。

sentences.english: He proposed to rebuild ethical education, by neatening customs to save Xanadu civilization.
sentences.chinese: 倡言重建礼教，整顿风俗，保存华夏文明。

sentences.english: " China is "the world" center of civilization, there is no need to learn from living overseas.
sentences.chinese: 华夏是“天下”的文明中心，无须向蛮夷学习。

sentences.english: Yandi and Huangdi are the legendary ancestors of the Chinese nation.
sentences.chinese: 传说炎黄二帝是华夏民族的祖先。

sentences.english: Chinese language and writing is also an important feature of Chinese culture.
sentences.chinese: 汉语和文字亦是华夏文化的重要特征。

sentences.english: It’s Huaxia music and dance, It’s Chnese traditional music and dance.
sentences.chinese: 看华夏乐舞，这是中国传统的音乐舞蹈。

sentences.english: But at that time Chinese ancestors, are also being gradually the transition to the patriarchal society.
sentences.chinese: 只是当时华夏先民，也正在逐步向父系社会过渡。

sentences.english: Xinxiang has been the centre of Chinese civilization since ancient times.
sentences.chinese: 新乡自古即为华夏文明腹心地带。

definition: Celestial Empire, tributary title conferred on imperial China/Taiping Heavenly Kingdom
